sentences.en: As they regarded each other, Andrew was conscious of a constraint between them.
sentences.cn: 他们互相谛视着, 安德鲁感到,俩人都有些局促.

sentences.en: At length these moments of constraint were removed.
sentences.cn: 这种尴尬的局面终于过去了.

sentences.en: Constraints on spending have forced the company to rethink its plans.
sentences.cn: 由于开支受到限制，这家公司不得不重新考虑其计划。

sentences.en: He felt constraint in her presence.
sentences.cn: 他在她面前显得局促不安.

sentences.en: He sat down , at first, with some constraint and awkwardness.
sentences.cn: 他刚入座时还感到有点拘束和别扭.

sentences.en: Here the constraint is the difficulty of designing an economically feasible electric car.
sentences.cn: 这里的困难是难以设计出一种经济上合理的电动汽车.

sentences.en: I was aware of a certain constraint on their part when they were in my presence.
sentences.cn: 我觉察到我在时他们有些拘束.

sentences.en: In motion with a fixed frictionless constraint, no work is done by the constraint.
sentences.cn: 在固定的无摩擦约束运动中, 约束力不作功.

sentences.en: The boy felt constraint in her presence.
sentences.cn: 那男孩在她面前感到局促不安.

sentences.en: The only constraint is the mutual attraction between the molecules.
sentences.cn: 唯一的约束就是分子之间的相互吸引力.

sentences.en: The servants showed somewhat constraint in the master's presence.
sentences.cn: 仆人在主人面前显得多少有点局促.

sentences.en: The words slipped out unawares from her mouth after the long constraint.
sentences.cn: 那句话在长期受到禁锢之后下意识地从她嘴里溜了出来.

sentences.en: Their decision to abandon the trip was made because of financial constraints.
sentences.cn: 他们放弃这次旅行的决定是因财务限制而作出的。

sentences.en: Under some constraint conditions, a procedure to get the optional position of connected objects.
sentences.cn: 在某些约束条件下, 获得相连物体最佳位置的过程.

sentences.en: We felt a little constraint with the new teacher for the first day or so.
sentences.cn: 在开头一两天,我们对新教师感到有点拘束.
我们服从了, 然而是被迫的.

sentences.en: We study the phenomena of SBC ( soft budget constraint ) in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文的研究对象是软预算约束现象.

words.tran_cn: 拘泥的；被强迫的；不舒服的
勉强地；强迫地；不自然地
驱使；强迫；勉强（constrain的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: something that limits your freedom to do what you want
